version_description:
Gordon Ramsay: Chef Blast is now available Worldwide!

Update now and join players all over the world. Have a blast with amazing new puzzles. What’s more is exclusive recipes from Gordon Ramsay himself and super fun events!

So what are you waiting for? Start playing now!

Fixed the game hanging on the loading screen for some players.

A delicious new update is ready for tasting!

Update Today for new levels, new dishes and much more!

A DELIGHTFUL NEW UPDATE!

Enjoy the amazing new levels added as you try out all the delicious dishes from Gordon Ramsay himself!

And to make your Chef Blast experience better, various game improvements, bug fixes and optimizations have been made.

A DELIGHTFUL NEW UPDATE!

Enjoy the amazing new levels added as you try out all the delicious dishes from Gordon Ramsay himself!

And to make your Chef Blast experience better, various game improvements, bug fixes and optimizations have been made.

A SCRUMPTIOUS NEW UPDATE!

Fun new levels added for you to play as you cook with Gordon.

A new surprise, Oyster, has been added to the gameplay and will bring in exciting possibilities for you.

Bug Fixes and Optimizations have been made for an amazing Chef Blast experience.

Start cooking now!

SPRING UPDATE

Experience a spectacular new Spring theme.

Enjoy an inspiring ‘Fresh Pea and Mint Risotto’ Recipe Challenge.

Savor the exciting Puzzle levels that have been added.

Don’t miss out on this amazing Chef Blast experience! Update Now!

AN AWESOME TEAMS UPDATE

Team up with fellow Chef Blast players to Send and Receive Lives

Rule the Chef Blast world by reaching the top ranks in the Team Leaderboard

Win the new Recipe Challenge - Springs' Smoked Salmon, Potato Salad, Pickled Beetroot and Dill

And enjoy the new puzzle levels added. Update Now!
